layout.singingstanza: Gen -- uine, Ex -- act, Strict, Dil -- i -- gent, Broad, Fine, Sta -- ble, Pa -- tient, Deep, Pure, Just, Calm, Sin -- gle, Cor -- porate, O -- pen, Af -- fec -- tion -- ate, Ar -- dent, Ac -- com -- mo -- dat -- ing, Strong, Pli -- ant, Sub -- mis -- sive, Suf -- fer -- ing, Low -- ly, Poor, Stead -- fast, En -- dur -- ing, Bear -- ing, Clear, Mag -- nan -- i -- mous, and Grave.

lyrics.stanza: Genuine, Exact, Strict, Diligent, Broad, Fine, Stable, Patient, Deep, Pure, Just, Calm, Single, Corporate, Open, Affectionate, Ardent, Accommodating, Strong, Pliant, Submissive, Suffering, Lowly, Poor, Steadfast, Enduring, Bearing, Clear, Magnanimous, and Grave.
